options.content:
# üìä Hinweise

- Ab August 2024 liegen uns gespeicherte Daten f√ºr die neuen TikTok-Metriken und -Datensichtweisen vor.
F√ºr deep und deutlich konnten diese Daten erst ab November 2024 gesichert werden. F√ºr die Monate davor werden f√ºr deep und deutlich nur profilbezogene Daten ausgewiesen.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT profile) 
FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr

DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$LRA_profiles");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""
SELECT * FROM(
SELECT 
DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, 
REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'√§','ae'),'√Ñ','Ae'),'√∂','oe'),'√ñ','Oe'),'√º','ue'),'√ú','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'üçÄ',''),'√ü','ss'), '?', '') as profile,
videostarts as videostarts 
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat <= 12
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
AND CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "Radio Bremen" THEN DATE(jahr,monat,1) >= DATE(2025,1,1)
ELSE DATE(jahr,monat,1) >= DATE(2024,8,1) END
)
PIVOT (
  SUM(videostarts) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
),
all_values AS(
  SELECT
  profile,
  videostarts
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr 
)
SELECT 
REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'√§','ae'),'√Ñ','Ae'),'√∂','oe'),'√ñ','Oe'),'√º','ue'),'√ú','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'üçÄ',''),'√ü','ss') as profile,
IFNULL(videostarts,0) as videostarts
FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_values
USING(profile)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH('√ò Pro Tag')), '√ò Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT '√ò Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT
SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as Videostarts,
(SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as VideostartsProTag
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE 
            WHEN "$LRA" = "Radio Bremen" AND $month_as_number = 1 THEN ""
            WHEN $month_as_number = 19 THEN ""
            WHEN $month_as_number = 8 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $year_from_last_month"
            END As Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sum_in_mil,past_sum_in_mil) - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sum_per_day,past_sum_per_day) - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Vorjahresmonat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(videostarts)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(videostarts)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

DECLARE profiles STRING;
SET profiles = ("$LRA_profiles");
EXECUTE IMMEDIATE format("""
SELECT * FROM(
SELECT 
DATE(jahr,monat,1) as month_year, 
REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'√§','ae'),'√Ñ','Ae'),'√∂','oe'),'√ñ','Oe'),'√º','ue'),'√ú','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'üçÄ',''),'√ü','ss'), '?', '') as profile,
interactions
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN jahr = $Jahr AND monat <= 12
ELSE monat <= 12 AND DATE(jahr,monat,1) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) END
AND CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "Radio Bremen" THEN DATE(jahr,monat,1) >= DATE(2025,1,1)
ELSE DATE(jahr,monat,1) >= DATE(2024,8,1) END
)
PIVOT (
  SUM(interactions) FOR profile IN (%s)
)
ORDER BY DATE(month_year) ASC
""", profiles);

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
),
all_values AS(
  SELECT
  profile,
  interactions
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr 
)
SELECT 
REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'√§','ae'),'√Ñ','Ae'),'√∂','oe'),'√ñ','Oe'),'√º','ue'),'√ú','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'üçÄ',''),'√ü','ss') as profile,
IFNULL(interactions,0) as interactions
FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_values
USING(profile)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH('Summe')), 'Summe')
FROM(
SELECT 'Summe' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH('√ò Pro Tag')), '√ò Pro Tag')
FROM(
SELECT '√ò Pro Tag' as Gesamt
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " ", $Jahr) as Gesamt
)

SELECT
SUM(interactions)/1000000 as interactions,
(SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as interactionsProTag
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CASE 
            WHEN "$LRA" = "Radio Bremen" AND $month_as_number = 1 THEN ""
            WHEN $month_as_number = 19 THEN ""
            WHEN $month_as_number = 8 THEN ""
            ELSE "$LastMonat_abkuerzung $year_from_last_month"
            END As Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sum_in_mil,past_sum_in_mil) - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sum_per_day,past_sum_per_day) - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 48 - CHAR_LENGTH(Gesamt)), Gesamt)
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Vorjahresmonat_abkuerzung", " ", $LastJahr) as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as past_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year 
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(interactions)/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  (SUM(interactions)/MAX(anzahltage))/1000000 as current_sum_per_day
  FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil

WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), follower_values AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, followers
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(followers,0) as followers FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN follower_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY followers DESC

IF ($month_as_number = 8 AND $Jahr = 2024) OR ($month_as_number = 19 AND $Jahr = 2024) THEN
SELECT "", NULL;
ELSE
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_values AS(
SELECT 
lm.profile,
lm.profileId,
lm_follower,
IFNULL((lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100,0) as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(
SELECT
profile, profileId, followers as lm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY followers desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
profile, followers as llm_follower
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY followers desc
) as llm 
ON llm.profile = lm.profile
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(FollowerVeraenderung,0) as FollowerVeraenderung FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY lm_follower DESC;
END IF

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), videostarts_values AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, videostarts
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(videostarts,0) as videostarts FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN videostarts_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY videostarts DESC

IF ($month_as_number = 8 AND $Jahr = 2024) OR ($month_as_number = 19 AND $Jahr = 2024) THEN
SELECT "", NULL;
ELSE
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_values AS(
SELECT 
lm.profile,
lm.profileId,
lm_videostarts,
IFNULL((SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videostarts,llm_videostarts) - 1)*100,0) as VideostartsVeraenderung
FROM
(
SELECT
profile, videostarts as lm_videostarts, profileId
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY videostarts desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
profile, videostarts as llm_videostarts
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY videostarts desc
) as llm 
ON llm.profile = lm.profile
ORDER BY lm.lm_videostarts DESC)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(VideostartsVeraenderung,0) as VideostartsVeraenderung FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY lm_videostarts DESC;
END IF

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), interaktionen_values AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, interactions
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(interactions,0) as interaktionen FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN interaktionen_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY interaktionen DESC

IF ($month_as_number = 8 AND $Jahr = 2024) OR ($month_as_number = 19 AND $Jahr = 2024) THEN
SELECT "", NULL;
ELSE
WITH all_profiles AS(
    SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), all_values AS(
SELECT 
lm.profile,
lm.profileId,
lm_interactions,
IFNULL((SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_interactions,llm_interactions) - 1)*100,0) as InteraktionenVeraenderung
FROM
(
SELECT
profile, interactions as lm_interactions, profileId
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
ORDER BY interactions desc
) as lm
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT
profile, interactions as llm_interactions
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE 
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY interactions desc
) as llm 
ON llm.profile = lm.profile
ORDER BY lm.lm_interactions DESC)
SELECT all_profiles.profile as Profil, IFNULL(InteraktionenVeraenderung,0) as InteraktionenVeraenderung FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN all_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY lm_interactions DESC;
END IF

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), wiedergabedauer_in_std_values AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, sehVolumen
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(sehVolumen,0) as sehVolumen FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN wiedergabedauer_in_std_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY sehVolumen DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), anzahlvideos_value AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, anzahlVideos, sehVolumen
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(anzahlVideos,0) as anzahlVideos FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN anzahlvideos_value
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY sehVolumen DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), pot_reichweite_values AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, pot_reichweite_pro_video
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(pot_reichweite_pro_video,0) as pot_reichweite_pro_video FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN pot_reichweite_values
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_video DESC, profile ASC

WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile, tiktokID as profileId
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), anzahlvideos_value AS(
  SELECT
profile, profileId, anzahlVideos, pot_reichweite_pro_video
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
)
SELECT all_profiles.profile, IFNULL(anzahlVideos,0) as anzahlVideos FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN anzahlvideos_value
USING(profile,profileId)
ORDER BY pot_reichweite_pro_video DESC, profile ASC

WITH top_100_videos AS(
SELECT
* EXCEPT(LRA, profileId, likes, comments, shares, monat, jahr, interaction_rate, averageTimeWatched_in_minutes, hashtags)
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_posts
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"),
top_100_videos_covers AS(
  SELECT distinct externalId, MAX(videoCoverUrl) as videoCoverUrl
  FROM Quintly.tiktokAnalyticsOwnPosts
  WHERE CASE $month_as_number WHEN 19 THEN TRUE ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $month_as_number END AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr AND 
  CASE "$LRA_mapping" 
  WHEN "KiKa" THEN LRA = "MDR" 
  WHEN "Radio Bremen" THEN LRA = "RADIO_BREMEN"
  ELSE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" END
  GROUP BY externalId
)
SELECT * EXCEPT(externalId) FROM top_100_videos
JOIN 
top_100_videos_covers
USING(externalId)
ORDER BY views DESC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Top One Video je Profil nach Videostarts | ${Monat} ${Jahr}

targets.rawSql:
WITH top_100_videos AS(
SELECT * EXCEPT(row_num) FROM(
SELECT
* EXCEPT(LRA, profileId, likes, comments, shares, monat, jahr, interaction_rate, averageTimeWatched_in_minutes, hashtags),
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY profile ORDER BY views DESC) as row_num,
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_posts
WHERE CASE $month_as_number WHEN 19 THEN TRUE ELSE  monat = $month_as_number END AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping")
WHERE row_num = 1
),
top_100_videos_covers AS(
  SELECT distinct externalId, MAX(videoCoverUrl) as videoCoverUrl
  FROM Quintly.tiktokAnalyticsOwnPosts
  WHERE CASE $month_as_number WHEN 19 THEN TRUE ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $month_as_number END AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr AND 
  CASE "$LRA_mapping" 
  WHEN "KiKa" THEN LRA = "MDR"
  WHEN "Radio Bremen" THEN LRA = "RADIO_BREMEN"
  ELSE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" END
  GROUP BY externalId
)
SELECT * EXCEPT(externalId) FROM top_100_videos
JOIN top_100_videos_covers
USING(externalId)
ORDER BY views DESC

panels.title: Top One Video je Profil nach Videostarts

targets.rawSql:
WITH all_profiles AS(
  SELECT profile
  FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr
), current_values AS(
SELECT profile, followers as current_followers, anzahlVideos as current_anzahlPosts, interactions as current_interactions, videostarts as current_views, sehVolumen as current_sehVolumen, pot_reichweite_pro_video as current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE monat = $month_as_number AND jahr = $Jahr AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"),
past_values AS(
SELECT profile, followers as past_followers, anzahlVideos as past_anzahlPosts, interactions as past_interactions, videostarts as past_views, sehVolumen as past_sehVolumen, pot_reichweite_pro_video as past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN monat = $month_from_last_year AND jahr = $last_year
ELSE monat = $last_month AND jahr = $year_from_last_month END
AND LRA = "$LRA_mapping"
), joined_data AS(
SELECT * FROM all_profiles
LEFT JOIN
current_values
USING(profile)
LEFT JOIN 
past_values
USING(profile))
SELECT profile as Profil,
CASE current_followers
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_followers END as followers,
CASE 
WHEN (current_followers - past_followers = 0) OR (past_followers = 0) THEN NULL
ELSE current_followers - past_followers END as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_followers,past_followers)-1)*100
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_followers,past_followers)-1)*100 END as FollowerVeraenderung,

CASE current_anzahlPosts
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_anzahlPosts END as Anzahlposts,

CASE current_views
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_views END as videoViews10s,
CASE 
WHEN (current_views - past_views = 0) OR (past_views = 0) THEN NULL
ELSE current_views - past_views END as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_views,past_views)-1)*100
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_views,past_views)-1)*100 END as videoViews10sVeraenderung,

CASE current_interactions
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_interactions END as Interaktionen,
CASE 
WHEN (current_interactions - past_interactions = 0) OR (past_interactions = 0) THEN NULL
ELSE current_interactions - past_interactions END as InteraktionenVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions,past_interactions)-1)*100
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_interactions,past_interactions)-1)*100 END as InteraktionenVeraenderung,

CASE current_sehVolumen
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE current_sehVolumen END as sehVolumen,
CASE 
WHEN (current_sehVolumen - past_sehVolumen = 0) OR (past_sehVolumen = 0) THEN NULL 
ELSE current_sehVolumen - past_sehVolumen END as sehVolumenVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen,past_sehVolumen)-1)*100 
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_sehVolumen,past_sehVolumen)-1)*100 END as sehVolumenVeraenderung,

CASE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag
WHEN 0 THEN NULL 
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag END as PotReichweiteProVideo,
CASE 
WHEN (current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag - past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag = 0) OR (past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag = 0)  THEN NULL
ELSE current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag - past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag END as PotReichweiteProVideoVeraenderungAbsolut,
CASE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag,past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag)-1)*100
WHEN 0 THEN NULL
ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(current_pot_reichweite_pro_tag,past_pot_reichweite_pro_tag)-1)*100 END as PotReichweiteProVideoVeraenderung,

FROM joined_data
ORDER BY Profil DESC

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "MDR" as LRA
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "NDR"
UNION DISTINCT 
SELECT "Radio Bremen"
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

WITH months AS (
  SELECT 'Januar' AS month_name, 1 AS month_value, DATE($Jahr,02,08) AS min_date
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Februar', 2, DATE($Jahr,03,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'M√§rz', 3, DATE($Jahr,04,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'April', 4, DATE($Jahr,05,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mai', 5, DATE($Jahr,06,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juni', 6, DATE($Jahr,07,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Juli', 7, DATE($Jahr,08,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'August', 8, DATE($Jahr,09,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'September', 9, DATE($Jahr,10,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Oktober', 10, DATE($Jahr,11,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'November', 11, DATE($Jahr,12,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Dezember', 12, DATE($Jahr+1,01,08)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Jahr', 19, DATE($Jahr+1,01,08)
)
SELECT month_name
FROM months
WHERE CASE
WHEN $Jahr = 2024 THEN month_value >= 8 AND CURRENT_DATE >= min_date
ELSE CURRENT_DATE >= min_date END
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN month_value = (SELECT MAX(month_value) FROM months WHERE CURRENT_DATE() >= min_date AND month_value <= 12) AND $Jahr = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, month_value ASC

SELECT CAST(number AS STRING) FROM (
SELECT
CASE "$Monat"
WHEN "Januar" THEN 1
WHEN "Februar" THEN 2
WHEN "M√§rz" THEN 3
WHEN "April" THEN 4
WHEN "Mai" THEN 5
WHEN "Juni" THEN 6
WHEN "Juli" THEN 7
WHEN "August" THEN 8
WHEN "September" THEN 9
WHEN "Oktober" THEN 10
WHEN "November" THEN 11
WHEN "Dezember" THEN 12
WHEN "Jahr" THEN 19
END as number)

WITH alle_jahre AS(
SELECT DISTINCT jahr
FROM Quintly_frozen.tiktok_metrics
WHERE CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "Radio Bremen" THEN jahr >= 2025
ELSE jahr >= 2024 END)
 
SELECT CAST(jahr AS STRING)
FROM alle_jahre
ORDER BY
CASE
WHEN jahr = (SELECT MAX(jahr) FROM alle_jahre WHERE CURRENT_DATE() >= DATE(jahr || '-02-08')) THEN 0
ELSE 1 END, jahr DESC
SELECT FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE_ADD(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,7), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))

SELECT CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN CAST(0 AS STRING)
ELSE CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING) END
SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $month_as_number, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($month_as_number AS STRING)
SELECT CAST($Jahr-1 AS STRING)

SELECT
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "M√§rz"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END

SELECT
CASE $Jahr
WHEN 2024 THEN ""
WHEN 2025 THEN
CASE WHEN $month_as_number < 8 THEN "" END
ELSE
CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "M√§rz"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END
END

SELECT
CASE EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "M√§rz"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END

SELECT CASE $Jahr
WHEN 2024 THEN "''"
WHEN 2025 THEN
CASE WHEN $month_as_number < 8 THEN "''" END
ELSE CAST($Jahr - 1 AS STRING) END

current.text: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 2 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2025
current.value: EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = 2 AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = 2025

query.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE "${Monat:text}"
    WHEN "Jahr" THEN "EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time) = $Jahr"
    ELSE "EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $month_as_number AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr"
    END

SELECT CAST(zeitraum as STRING) FROM(
SELECT CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN 12
ELSE $month_as_number END AS zeitraum)

SELECT FORMAT_DATE('%d.%m.%Y',DATE(MAX(time)))
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.tiktokAnalytics`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND $Zeitraum AND followers IS not null

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE 
WHEN DATE($Jahr,$month_as_number,1) <= "2024-10-01" THEN "EXCEPT(LRA, profileId, videoCoverUrl, likes, comments, shares, reach, percentage_averageTimeWatched, totalTimeWatched_in_hour, monat, jahr)"
ELSE "EXCEPT(LRA, profileId, videoCoverUrl, likes, comments, shares, monat, jahr)" END

SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM(
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'√§','ae'),'√Ñ','Ae'),'√∂','oe'),'√ñ','Oe'),'√º','ue'),'√ú','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'üçÄ',''),'√ü','ss'), '?', '') as profile 
FROM Quintly_frozen.profiles
  WHERE LRA = "$LRA_mapping" AND tiktokID != 0 AND monat = $profile_Zeitraum AND jahr = $Jahr)

SELECT CASE
WHEN $month_as_number = 8 THEN ""
WHEN $month_as_number = 19 AND $Jahr = 2024 THEN "" 
ELSE CASE $month_as_number
WHEN 19 THEN "Ver√§nderung zum Vorjahr in %"
ELSE "Ver√§nderung zum Vormonat in %" END END

SELECT CASE "$LRA"
WHEN "KiKA" THEN "KiKa"
ELSE "$LRA" END

WITH nutzer AS (
  SELECT
CASE
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "dev") THEN "dev"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.login}", "mefo") THEN "mefo"
    WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@") THEN
      REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'@([^\.]+)')  -- Extracts part after '@' and before the first '.' Example: ad.westphal@ndr.de => ndr
    WHEN NOT CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "@")
         AND (CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "viewer") 
         OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${__user.email}", "podcast")) THEN
            REGEXP_EXTRACT("${__user.email}", r'^([^-\s]+)')  -- Extracts part before the first '-'. Example: ndr-viewer => ndr
    ELSE
      "Anonym"
  END AS nutzer_lra
),
filter_string AS (
  SELECT """
LRA=${LRA}|::|Monat=${Monat}|::|Jahr=${Jahr}
""" AS filter
)

SELECT CONCAT(
  "https://vqggwrz.pa-cd.com/event?s=645199&idclient=minerva&events=%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22page.display%22%2C%22data%22%3A%7B%22page%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.name}",
  "%22%2C%22m_visits%22%3A1%2C%22minerva_dashboard_id%22%3A%22",
  "${__dashboard.uid}",
  "%22%2C%22minerva_lra%22%3A%22",
  nutzer.nutzer_lra,
  "%22%2C%22minerva_filter%22%3A%22",
  filter_string.filter,
  "%22%7D%7D%5D"
) AS event_url
FROM nutzer, filter_string
